com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.engine.service

Class DynamicEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.engine.service.DynamicStickyService
            • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.engine.service.DynamicEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, DynamicEventListener

    public abstract class DynamicEngine
extends DynamicStickyService
implements DynamicEventListener
    Service to monitor various system events to provide event specific functionality in the app.

    Extend this service and implement the interface functions to monitor the different events.

    Package must be granted Manifest.permission_group.PHONE permission to listen call events on Android M and above devices.

    Package must be granted Manifest.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS permission to detect the foreground app on Android L and above devices.

        public void setAppMonitorTask(boolean running)
        Enable or disable the foreground app monitor task.
        Parameters:
        running - true to start monitoring the foreground app and receive listener callback.
        See Also:
        DynamicEventListener.onAppChange(DynamicAppInfo)

      • setAppMonitorTaskPaused

        public void setAppMonitorTaskPaused(boolean paused)
        Pause or resume the foreground app monitor task.
        Parameters:
        paused - true to pause monitoring the foreground app and bo not receive listener callback.
        See Also:
        DynamicEventListener.onAppChange(DynamicAppInfo)
